```{r setup, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(reshape2)
library(readr)
library(gridExtra)
library(plotly)

aqua <- 'rgba(61, 217, 219, 1)'
data <- read_csv("./data/data.csv")
```

```{r warning=FALSE}
groupBySeason <- data %>% group_by(season) %>% 
  summarise(seasonRating = mean(rating)) %>% na.omit()

plot_ly(groupBySeason, x =~season, y =~seasonRating,
        marker = list(color = aqua)) %>%
  layout(title = "Rating by season",
         xaxis = list(title = "Season"), 
         yaxis = list(title ="Rating"))

plot_ly (groupBySeason,  x =~season, y =~seasonRating)
